name: War Strike Pro - land of battles
name_original: War Strike Pro - land of battles
description:
War Strike Pro is a strategic mobile game about future war and base building.

Build extractors to earn resources and banks to earn credits. You have to provide your own base with energy and wisely spend human resources.

Your base will be as strong and effective as you can do. Good planning can make you the winner of any battle!

Play War Strike Pro and make your way to the victory, glory and prosperity!
